channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Autoptimize
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Autoptimize

item.title: CVE-2023-2113|2024-08-02T06:12:20.061Z -- unknown -- autoptimize
item.description: The Autoptimize WordPress plugin before 3.1.7 does not sanitise and escape the settings imported from a previous export, allowing high privileged users (such as an administrator) to inject arbitrary javascript into the admin panel, even when the unfiltered_html capability is disabled, such as in a multisite setup.
